mbean.name: ClusteredSingleSignOn
mbean.description: A Valve that supports a 'single signon' user experience

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: cookieDomain
attribute.description: Domain to which sso cookies should be scoped

attribute.name: requireReauthentication
attribute.description: Should we attempt to reauthenticate each request against the security Realm?

attribute.name: maxEmptyLife
attribute.description: The maximum number of seconds an SSO with no active sessions will be usable by a request

attribute.name: processExpiresInterval
attribute.description: The minimum number of seconds between efforts by the valve to find and invalidate SSO's that have exceeded their 'maxEmptyLife'. Does not imply effort will be spent on such cleanup every 'processExpiresInterval'.

attribute.name: lastProcessExpires
attribute.description: The timestamp of the start of the last check for overaged SSO's with no active sessions.

attribute.name: clusterManager
attribute.description: SSOClusterManager to use for cluster support

attribute.name: clusterManagerClass
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the SSOClusterManager to use for cluster support

attribute.name: treeCacheName
attribute.description: The ObjectName of the TreeCache that this Valve should use for cluster communications. Only relevant if clusterManagerClass is org.jboss.web.tomcat.service.sso.TreeCacheSSOClusterManager
